description.oldValue: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams. GCC has been delayed.  We will publish a new roadmap item in the future when information becomes available.
description.newValue: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams. Attention: We will not be proceeding with GCC under this ID, and will provide a new ID when we are ready to proceed.  We appreciate your patience.
